Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for what you pay - it is a 2 1/2 star remember”
Reviews.Author: Meliss_John18
Reviews.Content: stayed march yes review little delayed sorry hotel fabulous location basic 2 12 star dont expected luxury clean warm breakfast adequate cereals juices fresh breads etc size price pay hear single recommend upgrading lift plus lifts rome stairs ideal floor personally enjoyed forced exercise yummy pizza road yes hotel dated opinion hotel value return faced budget

Reviews.Title: “Amazing hotel, great location and courteous service”
Reviews.Author: hagoela
Reviews.Content: start hotels excellent location fifteen minutes coliseum spanish steps 5 minutes termini train venice palace excellent service polite smiling receptionist help question provides nice breakfast hotel designed beautiful picturesque ceilings antique furniture feeling roman traveled mother women trip hotel contributed lot experience hotel located street near main nazionale street sympathetic pleasant night women summary hotel highly recommended israel

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly located hotel!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: an62
Reviews.Content: located hotel near termini station famous rome ok bit sleeping breakfast included mainly sweet cakes manage staff friendly mind choose hotel luxury else

Reviews.Title: “Rome could do without it”
Reviews.Author: diemblake
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel zara rome october 7 2010 late afternoonevening beginning challenge am budgetminded traveller read negative reviews hotel decided try location step via nazionale close spanish steps else positive reviews regarding location hotel care aesthetics didnt care care found elevator hold person time hisher suitcase third floor happened fourth elevator ride trip flights stairs front door door eager anticipation throw exhausted self unto bed awaiting discover darkness locating light glory expected narrow expected truly dark light expect standing closet doors missing desk television top chair window thanked gods horizontal mirror desk walked window pleasantly surprised view patio outline city rome sighed rome looked left assumed bathroom light expected exposed wires mirror sink expect expect loud noise produced light sighed am rome decided makeup getting pretty dark decided light source mirror actually doing foolish actually light downstairs desk attendant lamp sort provide light told sighed rome decided didnt light week start day days worse recognized night else slept bed expected expect hairs left person occupied bed lot sighing course week received fresh towels swept dust worse staffs insistence keeping window closed found dismay allowed male visitors single woman belief nevermind am gay told attendant law italy heard poor friend whom visit visit told wait outside downstairs allowed help bring shopping bags upstairs returned disappointing interfere law italy sighed decided return hotel help frequently talked staff referred la negra people presence didnt understand italian advice happen black woman travelling rome dirty hotels illmannered staff stay hotel zara regardless location grief involved staying worth

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: Lisa0668
Reviews.Content: booking hotel reading reviews expecting disappointed actually pleasantly surprised staff pleasant spoke english size clean location brilliant map found trevi fountain spanish steps quickly 4 day stay walked colosseum 15 minutes walk vatican 20 minutes definately stay hotel price brilliant

Reviews.Title: “not great at all”
Reviews.Author: friz038
Reviews.Content: stayed night thank goodness hotel fine outside reception little minds corridors air conditioned nicely decorated dull dank damp possibly dangerous air con looked due service broken switch exposed wiring etc wasnt confident adjusting allthough adjust didnt fridge kicking inside didnt cold beds filthy sheets move edge plagued fleas mosquitos literally land bedsheets common hot months distinct feeling permanent guests furniture awful mismatched junk shop stuff headboard coming wall sockets dodgy bathroom impossible wash wet type set dirty plug hole covered mat shower curtain straight 80s thats fit bathroom tiny 70 dust ledge stayed dressed bed avoid getting bitten worse injuries wet broken sockets mix dangerous safe leave obviously condition ages staff ok effort clean faint hearted luxury described boutique hotel im location walking distance termini station attractions lots eat safe shopping etc bit revamp clean fine wouldnt recommend didnt try breakfast left soon taxi booked airport run price little steep short walk train station taxi driver quoted half price grrrrr

Reviews.Title: “Not worth coming for the breakfast”
Reviews.Author: mynameismalena
Reviews.Content: ready arrived shower horrible wash yourself correctly water floor breakfast concluded sweet bakery horrible juice eat cheese butter bread towels changed day unnecessary french balcony staff restaurant tip location walk termini

Reviews.Title: “Junk... Do not stay here”
Reviews.Author: Jimberly01
Reviews.Content: horrible experience rude people terrible poorly maintained highlights stay arrive hot night dirty airconditioning double bed actually twin singles pushed split night leaving gap rude staff pretended pressured moved airconditioning 25c shower leaked floor breakfast stale uninspiring

Reviews.Title: “This hotel was perfectly adequate.”
Reviews.Author: RBMD
Reviews.Content: returned 11day trip italy time hotel perfectly adequate major plus location close easy distance major sites bus tothe vatican stops corner park belongings day fine size bathroom recently modernized tub shower bidet hotel quiet breakfast basic lots sweet breads pastries poor quality juice watered coffee dispensed machine fine dont expect major amenities

Reviews.Title: “city break”
Reviews.Author: avid
Reviews.Content: hotel central rome approximate 2030 minutes walk colleseum sized fridge tv english channel bathroom size bath plug shower breakfast cakes bread ample coffee tea machine expensive city careful service charges especially near st peters

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Zara
HotelInfo.Address: Via Delle Quattro Fontane 37, 00184 Rome, Italy
